title: mythio
author: mythio
content: Hello guys, let me introduce you altcoin analytics platform which we're working already for a few months in a team of 3 people: ðŸ‘‰ https://coinbrain.com ðŸ‘ˆOur analytics platform is currently operating only on BSC chain where we're automatically indexing all newly created tokens and track all important stats such as Market Cap, Volume, number of holders and more. On top of that, we also combine it with off-chain data such as social media followers tracking, website visits estimate, etc. ðŸ¤™Our 3 most popular features are definitely:  âœ… Automatic Safety Check We're automatically checking each token for the most common scam patterns and display it in a form of easy to understand overview. âœ… SwapWe've partnered with 0x.org to provide our users with the fastest, cheapest and most secure swap experience on BSC chain.Â âœ… FiltersYou can easily filter around 2.000.000 coins in our DB based on market cap, volume, number of trades, name and price to find the next 100X gems! I'll be happy for your feedback since we're still very new in the field and trying to build the service together with our users to achieve the best experience. ðŸ˜Š
